abstract: Baltimore reaches $6.4 million settlement with family of Freddie Gray, 25-year-old black man who sustained fatal spinal cord injury in police custody; Judge Barry G Williams  will soon decide whether to grant request to move trials of six officers facing related charges outside city.
lead_paragraph: The city has tentatively agreed to pay $6.4 million in the case. Mr. Gray died in April of spinal injuries sustained while he was in police custody.

headline.main: Baltimore Announces $6.4 Million Settlement in the Death of Freddie Gray
headline.print_headline: Baltimore Announces $6.4 Million Settlement in the Death of Freddie Gray

snippet: The city has tentatively agreed to pay $6.4 million in the case. Mr. Gray died in April of spinal injuries sustained while he was in police custody.
